title: Ola's Bhavish Aggarwal slams EV companies for making 'cute ads' to grow their sales
description: Ola Electric founder Bhavish Aggarwal emphasizes the importance of investing in supply chains and technology over marketing for electric vehicle companies. He announces the development of the 'Bharat Cell' battery and expansion of Ola's service centres across India.
